coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: No Pre-authorisation Required - 1,000,000.00. Medication Limit Is Equal To Pre-Authorization Approval Limit. No pre-approval required for VIP members for outpatient & in-patient services - Except the outpatient services having limits.
coverage_details.special_instructions: Freestyle devices for 50 members approved by Almamoon. Chronic Condition are covered. Frames are covered up to the optical limit. Class VVIP: Dental benefit is extended to include dental crown and implants as a part of dental benefit sub limit. Optical coverage is for all ages and for all schemes. Singulair, Warts, Osteoporosis, and Local Injection (in joints) are covered. Rehabilitation Treatment, Congenital, Neonatal Care from Day 1, Physiotherapy, Hearing & Visual Aids, Vaccination & Pre-existing & Artificial Limbs & Prosthesis & Medical Equipment are covered. Transportation of Mortal Remains SR 10,000. General Medical checkups for Naghi Family members and selected VIP members to be approved case by case up to SR 5,000 per member per year. The cost of 2 clinics operated by Dr. Abdul Rahman Ramadan at 2 locations with total fees of SR 10,000 per month. MRI, Physiotherapy and Vitamin D to be approved whenever requested except class C / D+ / and D.
